ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Faisal Shahzad, the 30-year-old son of a retired official in PakistanÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s air force, was charged Tuesday with trying to blow up a crude gasoline and propane device inside a parked SUV amid tourists and Broadway theatergoers. ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The best short-term solution to bottling up a disastrous oil spill threatening sealife and livelihoods along the Gulf Coast should be arriving on Wednesday in the form of a specially built giant concrete-and-steel box designed to siphon the oil away.

And while debate was well on its way, the endgame for the bill was far from clear.
